page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN TEMPLETON.
page.content: Templeton is a farming area.There are 18 farms in our Domesday Block and several smallholdings.Although unemployment figures in the county are high,there is very little unemployment in the Templeton area.Many professional people live in the new housing estates at Larkspur Gardens, Larkspur Close,Jubilee Gardens and Penygraig Drive.Businesses in Templeton include the Forge,Templeton Garage and a road haulage firm run by Mr.David Belt,who employs 6 people. There is an antique shop and restaurant at the Barn and meals are also served at the Boar's Head Inn. There are two caravan sites in the area.The site in the village runs the Greenfield Club. There is a riding stable at Shady Grove.
